Message: Spray a mix of sulfur and pyrethrins, BonideÂ® Orchard Spray. For best results, apply as a protective spray (2.5 oz/ gallon) early in the season.
Compounds for use include copper, oxytetracycline (Mycoshield and generic equivalents), and syllit+captan
Spray mixture of Agrimycin-100(0.01%) + Blitox-50(Copper oxychloride) at 0.2%
Stobilurin and Sterol-inhibitor fungicides (ISI) are recommended for use
Lime sulfur, or copper formulations are recommended to kill fungal spores.
